IINCHIP_IO_FUNC

This supports the basic I/O functions for IINCHIP_REG.

  • Basic I/O function
    IINCHIP_READ(), IINCHIP_WRITE(), getMR(), setMR()

  • COMMON_REG function
    1. Interrupt
      getIR(), setIR(), getIMR(), setIMR()
    2. Network Information
      getSHAR(), setSHAR(), getGAR(), setGAR(), getSUBR(), setSUBR(), getSIPR(), setSIPR()
    3. Retransmittion
      getRCR(), setRCR(), getRTR(), setRTR()
    4. PPPoE
      getPATR(), getPTIMER(), setPTIMER(), getPMAGICR(), setPMAGICR(), getPSIDR(), getPDHAR()
    5. ICMP packet
      getUIPR(), getUPORTR(), getFMTUR()
    6. PIN "BRDYn"
      getPn_BRDYR(), setPn_BRDYR(), getPn_BDPTHR(), setPn_BDPTHR()
    7. ID
      getIDR(void);

  • SOCKET_REG function
    1. SOCKET control
      getSn_MR(), setSn_MR(), getSn_CR(), setSn_CR(), getSn_IMR(), setSn_IMR(), getSn_IR(), setSn_IR()
    2. SOCKET information
      getSn_SSR(), getSn_DHAR(), setSn_DHAR(), setSn_DPORTR(), getSn_DIPR(), setSn_DIPR(), getSn_MSSR(), setSn_MSSR()
    3. SOCKET communition
      getSn_KPALVTR(), setSn_KPALVTR(), getSn_TX_WRSR(), setSn_TX_WRSR(),
      getSn_TX_FSR(), getSn_RX_RSR(), setSn_TX_FIFOR(), getSn_RX_FIFOR()
    4. IP header field
      getSn_FRAGR(), setSn_FRAGR(), getSn_PROTOR(), setSn_PROTOR(), getSn_TOSR(), setSn_TOSR(),
      getSn_TTLR(), setSn_TTLR()

  • ETC
    1. Initialization & Interrupt request routine W5300
      iinchip_init(), iinchip_irq()
    2. Interanl memory operation
      sysinit(), getIINCHIP_TxMAX(), getIINCHIP_RxMAX(), wiz_write_buf(), wiz_read_buf()
    3. PPPoE
      pppinit(), pppterm()

Generated on Fri Jan 2 12:20:01 2009 for W5300 - SOCKET APIs by  1.5.6
